Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Enacts the "blocking illegitimate reservations and defending individual entertainment (BIRDIE) act"
Summary: Enacts the "blocking illegitimate reservations and defending individual entertainment (BIRDIE) act" to prohibit third-party reservation services from listing, advertising, promoting or selling reservations for state-owned golf courses; provides monies received from penalties shall be deposited in the golf fund.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.32, Pks & Rec L; amd ยง99-gg, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "blocking illegitimate reservations and defending individual entertainment (BIRDIE) act"
